overview: The sudden and implementation of lockdown procedures in early 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic changed the lives of almost everyone around the world. For many, it meant they would have a lot more free time on their hands. In the case of Oliver Giles, he decided to use some of that free time to compile a list of memorable moments on film from March of 2016 up through March of 2020 Taking clips and photos from a variety of different projects during this time span, "2016 - 2020: Memories on Film" acts as a digital time capsule of unforgettable moments.
tagline: I'd rather live it all again than forget a single moment
title: 2016 - 2020: Memories on Film
